## Installation

```bash
# PyPI
pip install vcf-pg-loader==X.Y.Z

# BioConda
conda install -c conda-forge -c bioconda vcf-pg-loader=X.Y.Z

# Docker
docker pull ghcr.io/zacharyr41/vcf-pg-loader:X.Y.Z
```
